Summary: bright light zoomed towards east seemed to cross commercial flight path definitley not a commercial/chartared plane - no noise etc!!!
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Northampton
There were no other sightings in Northampton on or around September 4th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsOut in the back garden, said to husband look - it looked like a planed moving accross the sky towards the east, silent - no sound - no flashing lights etc - just constantly shone. Appeared at one point to be heading in commercial plane flight path but could not tell correct trojectory etc .
